name: Arataki Ichiban
description: After your Arataki Itto, who has this card equipped, uses Fight Club Legend for the second time or more in one Round: If Superlative Superstrength is triggered, deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: After your $[A1605], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S16051]</color> for the second time or more in one Round: If $[K1007] is triggered, deal +1 additional DMG.
